plot: Paris, May, 2012. In a more and more false world, shaken by the presidential elections, Fred, a solitary man, is going to build up to himself his own reality.
title: Tout est faux
plot_es: Paris, May, 2012. In a more and more false world, shaken by the presidential elections, Fred, a solitary man, is going to build up to himself his own reality.
plot_en: Paris, May, 2012. In a more and more false world, shaken by the presidential elections, Fred, a solitary man, is going to build up to himself his own reality.
